segments.text: How much does it cost for a bus pass ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It'll be $ 65 for a monthly pass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything cheaper than that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you're in school , you can get a student pass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I am how much will that cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't have to pay for anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll only have to pay for the monthly sticker .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much is the monthly sticker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take the student bus pass .
segments.speaker: S1
